description: Non material amendment to planning permission 17/0233/FUL dated 10/01/2018 for 'Redevelopment of site to provide a 6 storey building comprising 3,457sqm of Class A1 use (foodstore) at ground floor level and 96no. self-contained flats (Class C3) at first to fifth floor levels including basement car parking, cycle parking, refuse stores and a single storey car parking deck' amendments includes 'to condition 2 (superseding drawings) of planning permission 17/0233/FUL and minor alteration of the description of development. Proposed amendments includes changes to Asda Atrium and Entrance location, reconfiguration of windows and balconies, introduction of Ancillary space within the development, Materiality changes these have been limited to the rear boundary elevation and residential elevation over looking the service yard. Removal of conditions 7, 13 and 14, and the associated elements of non-material amendment  Variation of wording to condition 11
